thread.title: Kim Kardashian West’s Latest Styling Trick Is Pulled From the ’80s
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian West’s Latest Styling Trick Is Pulled From the ’80s

author: Edward Barsamian
title: Kim Kardashian West’s Latest Styling Trick Is Pulled From the ’80s
text:
Kim Kardashian West’s Latest Styling Trick Is Pulled From the ’80s January 6, 2017 5:27 pm Expand Photo: AKM -GSI 
It’s been a big week for Kim Kardashian West . After re-emerging on social media and refreshing her website and app , it appears that Mrs. West is changing up her look, too, with a return to girl-boss fashion, ’80s-style. Swapping out her Calabasas track pants for distressed denim, Kardashian West elevated her faded blues with a key piece of retro power dressing: the strong-shouldered jacket. 
Taking cues from 1980s shoulder pads, she joins a recent resurgence of designers revisiting Dynasty -era tailoring, including Olivier Rousteing at Balmain and David Koma at Mugler . The retro silhouette was given a sleek, modern makeover thanks to a slim lapel, but it was Kardashian West’s fresh accessorizing—note the lip ring—that lifted the ensemble into the territory of 21st-century CEO chic.
